content: more than just a cozy companion this 24 crochet bear is destined to be a cherished keepsake for years to come crafted in plush bernat baby blanket frosting you ll begin by creating two legs seamlessly joining them to form the body in one continuous piece the head ears and arms are made separately while the eyes nose and mouth are embroidered eliminating the need for small hazardous buttons with techniques such as chain stitch single_crochet increases decreases and more this delightful project promises to keep you captivated from start to finish materials bernat® baby blanket frosting™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m very berry 61016 1 ball or 218 yds/193 m measurement approx 24 61 cm tall
